basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ With a decade of legal experience as a licensed attorney in the state of Georgia, specializing primarily in family law and criminal defense, I've established a reputation for thinking outside the box and pioneering visionary approaches. Over the years, I've passionately advocated for my clients, utilizing creative arguments and theories in court to ensure they have a strong voice and representation. Currently, I am furthering my skill set and knowledge by pursuing studies in software development. My aim is to merge my legal expertise with technological innovation to establish The Dad Firmâ€”a platform dedicated to supporting fathers navigating custody and family legal matters. This exciting journey combines my legal background with a passion for leveraging technology to make a meaningful impact on the lives of fathers seeking custody rights.

projects.title: Classic
projects.description: My 201 final project was a team project, wehre we built the classic and nostalgic arcade game - Snake. For development, we used Javascript, CSS, and HTML5.
